duties_responsibilities.duty: Identifying and repairing problems with HVAC, electrical equipment, and mechanical systems.
Coordinating and completing corrective and preventative maintenance work requests.
Maintaining HVAC equipment as part of the facilities preventive maintenance program.
Conducting weekly Toolbox talks with the crew.
Providing technical assistance to clients regarding the operation of the facilities mechanical and HVAC systems.
Performing equipment maintenance, repairs, and inspections.
Operating, evaluating, and setting efficient parameters for the energy management systems.
Providing labor for preventive maintenance and repairs to mechanical equipment and systems.
Supervising and coordinating the work of outside contractors during repair or replacement projects.

education_certification.credential: Massachusetts Refrigeration Journeyman or Electrical License
